title: Delete Neeko Poll
body:
Neeko have  advantage  I can't tell you all the scenarios  but her are some add more if you have it:

1- Wasting  skills on clone .
2- Wasting cc on wrong target clone.
3-Wasting skills on wrong fed target clone.
4-Wasting flash cuz you  see a fed champion clone.


there is a reason in all games clones are hated.
